name: Homemade Tomato Sauce
short_description: A rich and flavorful tomato sauce made with fresh tomatoes, garlic, and herbs.
long_description: Homemade Tomato Sauce is a versatile and flavorful sauce crafted from fresh tomatoes, garlic, onions, and a blend of aromatic herbs. It's a perfect addition to pasta, pizza, or as a base for various dishes.
instructions: Saut√© garlic and onion in olive oil.
Add tomatoes, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Simmer until the sauce thickens. Blend for a smoother consistency.
